mapper.select:
select b.*,a.name from sas.companys as a left join assets as b on a.id = b.company_key
and b.update_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
and a.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and a.code like concat('%',#{code},'%')
and bactive=1
